info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 8:28PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Weld and northeastern Boulder Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 828 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Longmont, or 22 miles south of Fort Collins, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Longmont, Firestone, Frederick, Berthoud, Mead and Niwot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
